message.body: Hi love! Not sure what your plan is for tonight but I just wanted to let you know I'm going to skip out on yoga...I've been fighting a cold all week so I'm going to just try to sleep as much as ppossible haha
the 19th. I'll keep you posted! Get better soon!
Hey! So sorry to only respond now! I'm sorry you're under the weather :( I hope you feel better soon! I can't go next Monday but I'm aiming for Wednesday
Okay sounds good! And no worries!! :-)
